title: Best of the Program | Guests: Harry Jackson & Bill Waybourn | 4/19/22
description:
Glenn starts the show off by interviewing Harry Jackson, a father who was criminally charged after accusing a leftist activist of being a groomer. Glenn and Stu discuss the Left’s latest smear campaign against a Trump-appointed district judge after she shot down the CDC’s federal mask mandate. Sheriff Bill Waybourn joins to discuss the deathly amount of fentanyl that’s crossing the southern border.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
